title: Ep. - 301 - BECCA KUFRIN FROM THE BACHELORETTE UNSOLVED MYSTERIES WITH JONATHAN MARK
description:
Becca Kufrin is best known for her role as the winner on the 22nd season of ABC's The Bachelor and the lead of the 14th season of The Bachelorette. Becca shares what it really like to be The Bachelorette, how social media impacts the experience, and what really happens in the fantasy suite.

 

Medium Jonathan Mark goes through each case featured on Season 2 of Unsolved Mysteries on Netflix. The show highlights cases of perplexing disappearances, shocking murders and paranormal encounters.

 

The story of Joe Madison from this season of Finding Your Roots with Henry Louis Gates, Jr. on PBS. In each episode, celebrities are presented with a "book of life" that is compiled with information researched by professional genealogists that allows them to view their ancestral histories, learn about familial connections and discover secrets about their lineage.

 

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey

Cameo: https://www.cameo.com/katecasey

Twitter: @katecasey

Instagram: @katecaseyca

Facebook Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/113157919338245/

Amazon List: http://www.amazon.com/shop/katecaseyca


 

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
